## Test Figure

```{r test, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(grid)
library(lattice)
grid.newpage()
bg=trellis.par.get("background")
bg$alpha=0
trellis.par.set("")
grid.text("Endogenous",.05,.5,just=c("left"))
grid.text("Exogenous",.95,.5,just=c("right"))
grid.text("Covert",.5,.15,just=c("bottom"))
grid.text("Overt",.5,.85,just=c("top"))
grid.lines(c(.25,.75),.5,arrow=arrow(ends="both"),gp=gpar(lwd=2))
grid.lines(.5,c(.25,.75),arrow=arrow(ends="both"),gp=gpar(lwd=2))
```
